statements: SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT * FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id > 100
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_timeline ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_name, allocated_resources FROM project_timeline WHERE allocated_resources->>'team_lead' = 'John Doe'
SELECT project_id, project_name, milestones FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM project_timeline WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM project_timeline WHERE project_name LIKE '%Analysis%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id IN (1,2,3);
SELECT project_name, allocated_resources FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestones) AS milestone_count FROM project_timeline GROUP BY project_name HAVING milestone_count > 3 ORDER BY milestone_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_timeline;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestone ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT project_name FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestone WHERE project_id = 5 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE project_name LIKE '%project%';

SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_timeline JOIN milestone ON project_timeline.project_id = milestone.project_id WHERE milestone_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_timelines;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM milestones;
SELECT resource_name, allocated_hours FROM resource_allocation;

SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone_name, due_date, resource_name, allocated_hours FROM project_timelines JOIN milestones ON project_timelines.project_id = milestones.project_id JOIN resource_allocation ON project_timelines.project_id = resource_allocation.project_id AND milestones.milestone_id = resource_allocation.milestone_id;
SELECT * FROM project_timelines ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT milestone_name, due_date, project_name FROM milestones JOIN project_timelines ON milestones.project_id = project_timelines.project_id ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, allocated_hours FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_hours > 40 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;

SELECT project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS milestone_count FROM project_timelines LEFT JOIN milestones ON project_timelines.project_id = milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY milestone_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM timelines;
SELECT timeline_name, start_date, end_date FROM timelines;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_description FROM milestones;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM timelines;
SELECT timeline_id, timeline_name FROM timelines ORDER BY timeline_id DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_description FROM milestones WHERE milestone_id = 3;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Human';
SELECT timeline_name, start_date, end_date FROM timelines INNER JOIN milestones ON timelines.timeline_id = milestones.timeline_id;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, project_id, milestone_date FROM milestone WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT timeline_id, project_id, milestone_id, start_date, end_date FROM timeline WHERE project_id = 3 AND milestone_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM resource WHERE resource_type = 'Human Resource';
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, description FROM milestone WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM timeline JOIN milestone ON timeline.milestone_id = milestone.milestone_id WHERE timeline.end_date < NOW();

SELECT project.project_name, resource.resource_name FROM project JOIN project_resource ON project.project_id = project_resource.project_id JOIN resource ON project_resource.resource_id = resource.resource_id WHERE resource.resource_type = 'Software Engineer';
